body:
As energy resistance, except it absorbs the first 30 points of energy damage per attack.

Moderate abjuration; CL 11th; Craft Magic Arms and Armor, resist energy; Price +66,000 gp.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Armor/Magic Armor and Shield Special Ability Descriptions/Energy Resistance/Greater
name: Energy Resistance, Greater
